What is your return policy?: You can return any unopened items within 30 days for a full refund. Items must be in their original condition with all packaging intact. Please include your order number with the return.
How do I return an item?: To return an item, please visit our Returns Portal at example.com/returns, enter your order number and email, then follow the instructions. You'll receive a prepaid shipping label to print.
Can I exchange an item instead of return: Yes, you can exchange items within 30 days of purchase. Start a return through our Returns Portal and select 'Exchange' instead of 'Refund'. You'll be able to select the replacement item.
How long do refunds take to process?: Refunds typically take 3-5 business days to appear in your account after we receive your return. The exact timing depends on your payment method and financial institution.
How do I track my order?: You can track your order by clicking the tracking link in your confirmation email or by logging into your account and viewing your order history.
Tracking information can sometimes take 24-48 hours to update. If it hasn't updated after 2 days, please contact our support team with your order number.
Do you ship internationally?: Yes, we ship to over 100 countries worldwide. Shipping costs and delivery times vary by location. You can see estimated costs by entering your address during checkout.
Which countries do you not ship to?: Due to shipping restrictions, we cannot ship to certain countries including North Korea, Iran, Syria, and Cuba. For a complete list, please visit our Shipping Policy page.
What payment methods do you accept?: We accept Visa, Mastercard, American Express, Discover, PayPal, Apple Pay, Google Pay, and Shop Pay. All transactions are securely processed and encrypted.
Do you offer financing options?: Yes, we offer financing through Affirm and Klarna. You can select these payment options during checkout to see if you qualify and review the terms.
How long does shipping take?: Domestic orders typically arrive within 3-5 business days. International shipping can take 7-14 business days. Expedited shipping options are available at checkout.
Do you offer expedited shipping?: Yes, we offer Next Day and 2-Day shipping options for most domestic addresses. These options are available at checkout for an additional fee.
Do you offer free shipping?: We offer free standard shipping on all domestic orders over $50. International orders and orders below $50 will have shipping costs calculated at checkout.
How do I check my order status?: You can check your order status by logging into your account and viewing your order history, or by clicking the 'Check Status' link in your order confirmation email.
Can I modify or cancel my order?: You can modify or cancel your order within 1 hour of placing it by contacting our customer service team. After that, we begin processing and cannot guarantee changes.
Do you offer gift wrapping?: Yes, we offer gift wrapping for $5 per item. You can select this option during checkout and add a personalized message to be included with your gift.
How do I redeem a coupon code?: You can redeem a coupon code by entering it in the 'Promo Code' field during checkout, before finalizing your payment. Only one coupon code can be used per order.
Do you have a loyalty program?: Yes, our Rewards Program gives you points for every purchase, which can be redeemed for discounts. Sign up for a free account to automatically join the program.
How do I contact customer service?: You can contact our customer service team by email at support@example.com, by phone at 1-800-555-1234, or through live chat on our website. We're available 7 days a week from 9am to 9pm EST.
Are your products eco-friendly?: Many of our products meet eco-friendly standards. Look for the 'Eco-Friendly' badge on product pages. We're committed to increasing our sustainable product offerings each year.
What is your privacy policy?: Our privacy policy outlines how we collect, use, and protect your personal information. We never sell your data to third parties. You can read the full policy at example.com/privacy.
Do you have physical stores?: Yes, we have 12 retail locations across the United States. You can find the nearest store using our Store Locator tool on our website.
Do you offer student discounts?: Yes, we offer a 10% student discount with verified student ID through SheerID. Visit our Student Discount page to verify your status and receive your discount code.
Do you sell gift cards?: Yes, we offer digital and physical gift cards ranging from $25 to $500. Digital gift cards are delivered by email, usually within minutes of purchase.
How do I check my gift card balance?: You can check your gift card balance by visiting example.com/gift-card-balance and entering your gift card number and PIN.
